content.rendered:
Harmony Medical Trust (Silver Homes)  is instituting a donation refund policy to ensure fair and transparent processing of requests for refund of donations as digital payments are becoming more frequent. Harmony Medical Trust (Silver Homes) expects that all donors will exercise due care and diligence while making donations. Harmony Medical Trust (Silver Homes)  also recognises that a donation may be made erroneously or donors may change their mind.

Harmony Medical Trust (Silver Homes) will examine each request for refund of donation and endeavour to make the refund. Harmony Medical Trust (Silver Homes) may also seek further information / documents and donor must co-operate in this regard.

However, Harmony Medical Trust (Silver Homes) is not obliged to make refunds and may, in its discretion, decline any requests for refund of donations, particularly if a tax exemption certificate has been issued.

  • If you would like your donation to Harmony Medical Trust (Silver Homes) to be refunded,
  • You must request Harmony Medical Trust (Silver Homes) in writing or by email for a refund and Your request must reach Harmony Medical Trust (Silver Homes) within 15 (fifteen) days from the date on which you made the donation i.e. the date on which you:
    • Made the donation online, electronically or through other means.

The written request stating reason for requesting refund must be sent to the address stated below and must contain all the following details pertaining to the donation: Date of donation

  • Donation amount
  • If donation was made through cheque/draft, please provide Cheque/Draft no.
  • If donation was made through credit card, please provide Credit Card no. (last 4 digits only).
  • If donation was made online, please provide Donation-ID.

Harmony Medical Trust (Silver Homes)

Address: Survey no 37, Sai Chowk, near Madhuban Society, Balewadi, Pune.

All decisions of Harmony Medical Trust (Silver Homes) in this regard will be final and binding on the donor.
